content: materials needed 1 ball 3ply crochet cotton 2mm crochet hook earring hooks jewellery pliers sewing needle scissors fabric stiffener glue paint brush foam board & pins terminology & stitches used chain - chain - yarn over pull through 1 loop on hook slip_stitch - slip_stitch - insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch and 1 loop on hook treble_crochet - treble - yarn over x2 insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch *yarn over pull through 2 loops on hook* x3 dtr - treble_crochet - yarn over x3 insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch *yarn over pull through 2 loops on hook* x4 trtr - triple treble - yarn over x4 insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch *yarn over pull through 2 loops on hook* x5 qtr - quadruple treble - yarn over x5 insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch *yarn over pull through 2 loops on hook* x6 notes using the fabric glue is an optional but recommended step it makes your earrings sit much flatter and neater and is so easy to do
